items.sentence: Doing something with someone else is more fun than doing it alone.
I wanted Tom to play chess with me, but he said he didn't want to.
Tom said that he and his wife would go to Australia in the spring.
Tom says that he always has at least three hundred dollars on him.
I hope that you know that the last thing I want to do is hurt you.
I hope you know that the last thing that I want to do is hurt you.
I realized even though I wanted to eat, I didn't have enough time.
Tom works as a blood spatter analyst with the metropolitan police.
Tom won't back down from any fight, no matter who he's up against.
Tom's new puppy is so small he can fit into the palm of your hand.
